greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle with columns built from certain power sequences.
comment: The column sequences (without leading 0's)give: A000079, A002001, A067411-2 for m=0..3 and A067413-6 for m=5..8. The fifth column (m=4) is [1,6,60,600,6000,60000,...].
xref: Cf. A009998 (triangle built from powers of (m+1)), A067402.
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 25 2002
